mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Search.SimplePageSearch.DefaultContent
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Package can be installed on one of the C1 Starter Sites (Open Cph, Venus, ...)
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Package installs Search page and inserts "NavbarSearchForm" function call into the "Service Menu" template feature
